pages.text: 19|26|Eteke khoraa, pana karaa arau caku jura peloraa. Yadi kono manuhara lagata tomara dekha haya tente ka’ba, ‘ma'i rahamanara uddesye maunata aralambanara manata karaicho. Seye ma'i aji karao lagata katha naka'om’.
19|27|Tara pichata te'om kemcuraatika lai nija sampradayara ocarata upasthita ha’la, sihamte ka’le, ‘he mara'iyama! Arasye tumi eta adbhuta bisaya lai ahicha’.
19|28|‘He haraunara bhagni! Tomara pitr kintu asat byakti nachila arau tomara matr'o byabhicaraini nachila’.
19|29|Tetiya mara'iyame kemcuraatira prati ingita karaile. Sihamte ka’le, ‘dolanata thaka eti kemcuraara lagata ami kenekai katha patima’
19|30|kemcuraatorae mata lagale, ‘niscaya ma'i ejana allahara banda. Teraemi moka kitaba pradana karaiche arau moka nabi bana'iche
19|31|‘ma'i ya’te'i nathako kiya te'om moka barakatamaya karaiche, arau yimana dina jiraita thakima teraemi moka chalata arau yakata adaya karaibalai nirdesa diche
19|32|‘arau moka mora matrra prati anugata karaiche arau te'om moka ahankarai, abadhya karaa na'i
19|33|‘Arau mora prati santi yidina ma'i janma labha karaicho, yidina mora mrtyu ha’ba arau yidina ma'i jiraita arasthata ut'thita hama’.
19|34|E'omrae'i haiche mara'iyamara putra icha. (Yito barnana karaa ha’la) e'itorae satya katha, yi bisaye sihamte sandeha posana karaiche.
19|35|Santana grahana karaa allahara kama nahaya. Te'om paraitra mahimamaya. Te'om yetiya kiba karaibalai sthira karae, tetiya kerala e'i buli kaya ‘ha’ se'ito tatksanata hai yaya.
19|36|Niscaya allahe'i mora raba arau tomalokarao raba; seye tomaloke te'omra ibadata karaa, e'itorae'i sarala patha.
19|37|Tathapi'o dalasamuhe nijara majate matanaikya srsti karaile, seye mahadirasa pratyaksakalata kaphirasakalara babe dhbansa anibarya.
19|38|Sihamte yidina amara ocarata upasthita ha’ba sidina sihamta kimana ye spastakai suna paba arau dekha paba! Kintu yalimasakala aji spasta bibhraantita ache.
